mapper.select: select id, title, type, video_time, video_url, text_content, course_id, create_time, update_time from chapter
mapper.insert: insert into chapter(title, type, video_time, video_url, text_content, course_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{title}, #{type}, #{videoTime}, #{videoUrl}, #{textContent}, #{courseId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update chapter set
title = #{title},
type = #{type},
video_time = #{videoTime},
video_url = #{videoUrl},
text_content = #{textContent},
update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
